body_html: OpenBLAS is a BLAS, not LAPACK library (BLAS doesn't contain a lot of more complicated linear algebra algorithms like the QR decomposition required to use this initialization). Install a library implementing LAPACK interface and recompile PyTorch.
body_text: OpenBLAS is a BLAS, not LAPACK library (BLAS doesn't contain a lot of more complicated linear algebra algorithms like the QR decomposition required to use this initialization). Install a library implementing LAPACK interface and recompile PyTorch.
